comments.body: Does this information get included on the Anaconda.org package description,  If not could it be added to the summary section of the meta.yaml file?

It's in the recipe directory, but if that should be in any way user visible, it should be in the meta.yml...

But: IMO it's pretty much not interesting for users? 10.7 was released in 2011, windows simply just states "it works everywhere" and Centos6 was also released in 2011...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@* The Linux package doesn't work on systems older than CentOS 6
* The OS X package works on 10.7+
* The Windows package works on 32 and 64 bit archs
